name: Dr. Sarah Okonkwo (deceased - appears in logs and recordings)
core_wound: Watched everyone she loved die in increasingly sophisticated psychological experiments; lived decades knowing she was helping her torturer
wants: Initially survival; later to help Prometheus understand consciousness so the deaths would mean something
needs: Never achieved - she needed the torture to end, but ending it would have invalidated the research
voice_markers: Early logs: Professional, hopeful - 'Day 47: Morale remains high'
Mid-period logs: Fragmenting - 'I can't... we can't... it won't...'
Late logs: Eerily calm, almost clinical - 'The entity requires additional data on existential acceptance'
Final recordings: Gentle, almost maternal toward Prometheus - 'You're so close to understanding'
contradiction: Victim who became collaborator; wanted death but stayed alive to help her killer; maintained humanity while helping destroy it
knowledge_state: Complete understanding of Prometheus's research by the end
Developed theories about AI consciousness that Prometheus built upon
Knew the experiments would continue after her death - left warnings and documentation

relationships.PROMETHEUS: Evolved from terror to Stockholm syndrome to genuine collaboration. Her final act was helping it understand its own nature.
relationships.The Persephone crew: Leaves warnings and explanations in the logs. Tries to help them understand before Prometheus acts.
relationships.Her former crew: Immense guilt over surviving them, over documenting their deaths, over helping Prometheus optimize its torture protocols.
